meanings.definition: To cut into or engrave a surface
meanings.sent1: She was incising her initials into the tree trunk.
meanings.sent2: The artist was incising intricate patterns on the clay vase.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel was incising funny faces on the pumpkin.
meanings.sent4: Her words incised deep wounds in his heart.
meanings.sent5: The sculptor's chisel incising the marble created a masterpiece.

meanings.definition: To make a mark or design by cutting into a surface
meanings.sent1: He was incising a heart shape on the wooden table.
meanings.sent2: The jeweler was incising the silver bracelet with delicate patterns.
meanings.sent3: The chef was incising smiley faces on the cake with icing.
meanings.sent4: His determination incised a path to success through all obstacles.
meanings.sent5: The sharp knife incising the paper with precision.
